ta.title: வாஸ் குணவர்தேனா கண்டனம் செய்யப்பட்டு மரண தண்டனை
body_lines: தண்டனைக்கு எதிராக பிரதிவாதிகளின் மேல்முறையீடுகளுக்கு உச்ச நீதிமன்றம் தெரிவித்தது.

en.title: Vass Gunawardena has been condemned and the death penalty
body_lines: The death penalty for former DIG Vaas Gunawardena, including former DIG Vass Gunawardena, has confirmed by former DIG Vass Gunawardena.
Former DIG Vass Gunawardena, his son Ravindu Gunawardena, his son Ravindu Gunawardena, his son Ravindu Gunawardena, his son, Ravindu Gunawardena, was presented to the Colombo High Court today (20).
The Supreme Court informed the appeals by the defendants against punishment.

summary_lines: Former DIG Vass Gunawardena sentenced to death penalty. Son Ravindu also implicated. Case presented in Colombo High Court. Supreme Court to hear appeals against punishment.
